issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
- File/New/Mobile App Project
- Default Alloy Project
- See screen shot for information entered and error that occurred

"unable to create new project
ERROR  | Unexpected token A"

I am entering this here because the ticket submission tool in the Studio also crashes.

comments.body:
Hello,

We tested your issue in our environment. Its working as expected.

*Test Steps:*

Please follow the steps below and let us know.

*In Studio:*

1.From the menu, select *File > New > Mobile App Project > Alloy>Default Alloy Project *

2.In the Project hame field, enter *testproject*.

3.In the App Id field, enter *com.example. testproject*

4.Click Next, then click *Finish*.



*Test Environments:*

CLI Version :4.0.1

Titanium SDK  Version:4.1.0.GA

Android: Google Galaxy Nexus:4.1.1 - API 16 - 720x1280

Appc Studio: Appcelerator Studio, build: 4.1.1.201507141126

Alloy: 1.6.2

Mac OS X,Version:10.10.3

*Test Result:*

Project creation is successful.


Thanks
